name: Mouse Your Way (Download Version + Fixed)
description:
• This is a puzzle-platformer game where your computer mouse is your main tool
  • Use A to move left, D to move right and W to jump.
  • Your mouse will be used to remove blocks
  • Press R to reset the level
  • The smiling cube in the beginning acts as your help guide

This it the fixed version of the game and is now downloadable. I've added a jump sound and you will no longer constantly move after stopping.

This was originally part of a 2 day game jam.
